titles.title: A resolution recognizing and commending the people of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park on the 75th anniversary of the establishment of the park.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/2/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the people of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park on the 75th anniversary of the Park. Commends the people of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park and the National Park Service (NPS) for 75 years of successful management and preservation of the Park's land. Commends the citizens of western North Carolina and eastern Tennessee for their vision and sacrifice in bringing the Great Smoky Mountains National Park into being.
